name: Cuadrado's Trials
description:
Cuadrado just got booted and has to undergo the mandatory lab trials to get him ready for human assistance in the outside world. As you can imagine, the disasters and hardships of the outside are simulated inside the lab! Doesn't help that his power supply is severely drained by the many AI computations. Can you help this little robot reach his goal before he's out of time?

Controls

  • D-PAD: Movement
  • Spacebar: Jump

This is my entry for the GameDev.tv Game Jam!  https://itch.io/jam/gamedevtv-community-jam. They don't have courses on Phaser, but I thought it's a good opportunity to brush up on it. If there's some room for growth here I'll probably flesh it out more with Godot.

Made in the Caribbean with ♥
